1: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <sup>5058 </sup> <n>on Neginoth</n> מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <sup>4905 </sup> <n>Maschil</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <sup>238 </sup> <n>Give ear</n> אֱ֭לֹהִים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <sup>8605 </sup> <n>to my prayer</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּ֝תְעַלַּ֗ם <sup>5956 </sup> <n>and hide</n> מִתְּחִנָּתִֽי׃ <sup>8467 </sup> <n>not thyself from my supplication</n>
2: הַקְשִׁ֣יבָה <sup>7181 </sup> <n>Attend</n> לִּ֣י וַעֲנֵ֑נִי <sup>6030 </sup> <n>unto me and hear</n> אָרִ֖יד <sup>7300 </sup> <n>me I mourn</n> בְּשִׂיחִ֣י <sup>7879 </sup> <n>in my complaint</n> וְאָהִֽימָה׃ <sup>1949 </sup> <n>and make a noise</n>
3: מִקּ֤וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>Because of the voice</n> אוֹיֵ֗ב <sup>341 </sup> <n>of the enemy</n> מִפְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>because</n> עָקַ֣ת <sup>6125 </sup> <n>of the oppression</n> רָשָׁ֑ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יָמִ֥יטוּ <sup>4131 </sup> <n>for they cast</n> עָלַ֥י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אָ֝֗וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> וּבְאַ֥ף <sup>639 </sup> <n>upon me and in wrath</n> יִשְׂטְמֽוּנִי׃ <sup>7852 </sup> <n>they hate</n>
4: לִ֭בִּי <sup>3820 </sup> <n>My heart</n> יָחִ֣יל <sup>2342 </sup> <n>is sore pained</n> בְּקִרְבִּ֑י <sup>7130 </sup> <n>within</n> וְאֵימ֥וֹת <sup>367 </sup> <n>me and the terrors</n> מָ֝֗וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>of death</n> נָפְל֥וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>are fallen</n> עָלָֽי׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
5: יִרְאָ֣ה <sup>3374 </sup> <n>Fearfulness</n> וָ֭רַעַד <sup>7461 </sup> <n>and trembling</n> יָ֣בֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>are come</n> בִ֑י וַ֝תְּכַסֵּ֗נִי <sup>3680 </sup> <n>hath overwhelmed</n> פַּלָּצֽוּת׃ <sup>6427 </sup> <n>upon me and horror</n>
6: וָאֹמַ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And I said</n> מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>I</n> יִתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Oh that</n> לִּ֣י אֵ֭בֶר <sup>83 </sup> <n>I had wings</n> כַּיּוֹנָ֗ה <sup>3123 </sup> <n>like a dove</n> אָע֥וּפָה <sup>5774 </sup> <n>[for then] would I fly away</n> וְאֶשְׁכֹּֽנָה׃ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>and be at rest</n>
7: הִ֭נֵּה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אַרְחִ֣יק <sup>7368 </sup> <n>far off</n> נְדֹ֑ד <sup>5074 </sup> <n>Lo [then] would I wander</n> אָלִ֖ין <sup>3885 </sup> <n>[and] remain</n> בַּמִּדְבָּ֣ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n>
8: אָחִ֣ישָׁה <sup>2363 </sup> <n>I would hasten</n> מִפְלָ֣ט <sup>4655 </sup> <n>my escape</n> לִ֑י מֵר֖וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>from the windy</n> סֹעָ֣ה <sup>5584 </sup> <n>storm</n> מִסָּֽעַר׃ <sup>5591 </sup> <n>[and] tempest</n>
9: בַּלַּ֣ע <sup>1104 </sup> <n>Destroy</n> אֲ֭דֹנָי <sup>136 </sup> <n>O Lord</n> פַּלַּ֣ג <sup>6385 </sup> <n>[and] divide</n> לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>their tongues</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> רָאִ֨יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>for I have seen</n> חָמָ֖ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>violence</n> וְרִ֣יב <sup>7379 </sup> <n>and strife</n> בָּעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in the city</n>
10: יוֹמָ֤ם <sup>3119 </sup> <n>Day</n> וָלַ֗יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>and night</n> יְסוֹבְבֻ֥הָ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>they go about</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>her upon</n> חוֹמֹתֶ֑יהָ <sup>2346 </sup> <n>it upon the walls</n> וְאָ֖וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>thereof mischief</n> וְעָמָ֣ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>also and sorrow</n> בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>[are] in the midst</n>
11: הַוּ֥וֹת <sup>1942 </sup> <n>Wickedness</n> בְּקִרְבָּ֑הּ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>[is] in the midst</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָמִ֥ישׁ <sup>4185 </sup> <n>depart</n> מֵ֝רְחֹבָ֗הּ <sup>7339 </sup> <n>not from her streets</n> תֹּ֣ךְ <sup>8496 </sup> <n>thereof deceit</n> וּמִרְמָֽה׃ <sup>4820 </sup> <n>and guile</n>
12: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> אוֹיֵ֥ב <sup>341 </sup> <n>For [it was] not an enemy</n> יְחָֽרְפֵ֗נִי <sup>2778 </sup> <n>[that] reproached</n> וְאֶ֫שָּׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>me then I could have borne</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> מְ֭שַׂנְאִי <sup>8130 </sup> <n>[it] neither [was it] he that hated</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הִגְדִּ֑יל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>me [that] did magnify</n> וְאֶסָּתֵ֥ר <sup>5641 </sup> <n>[himself] against me then I would have hid</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
13: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>But [it was] thou a man</n> כְּעֶרְכִּ֑י <sup>6187 </sup> <n>mine equal</n> אַ֝לּוּפִ֗י <sup>441 </sup> <n>my guide</n> וּמְיֻדָּֽעִי׃ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and mine acquaintance</n>
14: אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יַ֭חְדָּו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> נַמְתִּ֣יק <sup>4985 </sup> <n>We took sweet</n> ס֑וֹד <sup>5475 </sup> <n>counsel</n> בְּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto the house</n> אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> נְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>[and] walked</n> בְּרָֽגֶשׁ׃ <sup>7285 </sup> <n>in company</n>
15: [יַשִּׁימָוֶת כ] (יַשִּׁ֤י ק) (מָ֨וֶת <sup>3451 </sup> <n>let death seize</n> ק) עָלֵ֗ימוֹ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> יֵרְד֣וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>upon them [and] let them go down</n> שְׁא֣וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>into hell</n> חַיִּ֑ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>quick</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> רָע֖וֹת <sup>7451 </sup> <n>for wickedness</n> בִּמְגוּרָ֣ם <sup>4033 </sup> <n>[is] in their dwellings</n> בְּקִרְבָּֽם׃ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>[and] among</n>
16: אֲ֭נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>upon</n> אֱלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>upon God</n> אֶקְרָ֑א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>As for me I will call</n> וַ֝יהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> יוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>shall save</n>
17: עֶ֤רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>Evening</n> וָבֹ֣קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>and morning</n> וְ֭צָהֳרַיִם <sup>6672 </sup> <n>and at noon</n> אָשִׂ֣יחָה <sup>7878 </sup> <n>will I pray</n> וְאֶהֱמֶ֑ה <sup>1993 </sup> <n>and cry aloud</n> וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and he shall hear</n> קוֹלִֽי׃ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>my voice</n>
18: פָּ֘דָ֤ה <sup>6299 </sup> <n>He hath delivered</n> בְשָׁל֣וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in peace</n> נַ֭פְשִׁי <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> מִקֲּרָב־ <sup>7128 </sup> <n>from the battle</n> לִ֑י כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בְ֝רַבִּ֗ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>[that was] against me for there were many</n> הָי֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עִמָּדִֽי׃ <sup>5978 </sup> <n>against</n>
19: יִשְׁמַ֤ע ׀ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>shall hear</n> אֵ֨ל ׀ <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> וְֽיַעֲנֵם֮ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>defile</n> וְיֹ֤שֵׁ֥ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>them even he that abideth</n> קֶ֗דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>of old</n> סֶ֥לָה <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> חֲלִיפ֣וֹת <sup>2487 </sup> <n>Because they have no changes</n> לָ֑מוֹ וְלֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָרְא֣וּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>therefore they fear</n> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>not God</n>
20: שָׁלַ֣ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>He hath put forth</n> יָ֭דָיו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hands</n> בִּשְׁלֹמָ֗יו <sup>7965 </sup> <n>against such as be at peace</n> חִלֵּ֥ל <sup>2490 </sup> <n>with him he hath broken</n> בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>his covenant</n>
21: חָלְק֤וּ ׀ <sup>2505 </sup> <n>were smoother</n> מַחְמָאֹ֣ת <sup>4260 </sup> <n>than butter</n> פִּיו֮ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>[The words] of his mouth</n> וּֽקֲרָב־ <sup>7128 </sup> <n>but war</n> לִ֫בּ֥וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>[was] in his heart</n> רַכּ֖וּ <sup>7401 </sup> <n>were softer</n> דְבָרָ֥יו <sup>1697 </sup> <n>his words</n> מִשֶּׁ֗מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>than oil</n> וְהֵ֣מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> פְתִחֽוֹת׃ <sup>6609 </sup> <n>yet [were] they drawn swords</n>
22: הַשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>Cast</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>upon the LORD</n> יְהָבְךָ֮ <sup>3053 </sup> <n>thy burden</n> וְה֪וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and He</n> יְכַ֫לְכְּלֶ֥ךָ <sup>3557 </sup> <n>and he shall sustain</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִתֵּ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>suffer</n> לְעוֹלָ֥ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>thee he shall never</n> מ֗וֹט <sup>4131 </sup> <n>to be moved</n> לַצַּדִּֽיק׃ <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n>
23: וְאַתָּ֤ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>O</n> אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <sup>430 </sup> <n>But thou O God</n> תּוֹרִדֵ֬ם ׀ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>shalt bring them down</n> לִבְאֵ֬ר <sup>875 </sup> <n>into the pit</n> שַׁ֗חַת <sup>7845 </sup> <n>of destruction</n> אַנְשֵׁ֤י <sup>582 </sup> <n>men</n> דָמִ֣ים <sup>1818 </sup> <n>bloody</n> וּ֭מִרְמָה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>and deceitful</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יֶחֱצ֣וּ <sup>2673 </sup> <n>shall not live out half</n> יְמֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>their days</n> וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶבְטַח־ <sup>982 </sup> <n>but I will trust</n> בָּֽךְ׃
